The story of Athalie involves the period after King David, during the reigns of his son Absalom and then his grandson Adonijah. From what I recall, this was around 10th century BCE. So, the timeframe should be set in that era.

As for the location, since it's based on Old Testament events, the action would take place in Israel and Judah. The exact cities might include Jerusalem, where much of the political drama unfolds.
